name.value: Soccer Blast Pro Soccer Game: International Football Legends Expansion

item.description:
This amazing new card set was created by soccer aficionado and historian Bill Hild.

Included innovations such as "doubled qualities" for a few super-star players—which bringing added depth and realism to the cards and elevates the performances of the greatest-of-the-great.

There are 22 teams, each with 20 players and three goal keepers. A few of the world’s dominant soccer nations—Argentina, Brazil, England, for example—have had so many great players over so many years, they were allotted two teams in this set. (Rosters for each team are shown below.) 
Over 500 of the greatest soccer stars who ever took the pitch, each team presented in “national” colors.

Includes:

ARGENTINA I: S. Marzolini, C. Sosa, R. Perfumo, J. Olguin, J. Salomon, J. R. Delgado, J. Carrascosa, L. Monti, N. Rossi, A. Rattin, A. Gallego, A. Sastre, R. Bochini, A. Di Stefano, R. Orsi, F. Loustau, J. M. Moreno, A. Pedernera, A. Labruna, O. Sivori; GK: A. Carrizo, U. Fillil, A Tesoriere.

ARGENTINA II: J. Zanetti, A. Tarantini, O. Ruggieri, D, Passarella, R. Ayala, J. Sorin, W. Samuel, F. Redondo, E. Cambiasso, J. Mascherano, O. Ardiles, J. S. Veron, J. R. Riquelme, D. Maradona, A. Di Maria, L. Messi, C. Tevez, S. Arguero, G. Batistuta, H. Crespo; GK: S. Goycochea, S. Romero, M. Andujar.

BRAZIL I: D. Santos, C. Alberto, N. Santos, D. Da Guia, L. Pereira, Junior, M. Ramos, Zito, Clodoaldo, Didi, Gerson, Zizinho, Revelino, Dirceau, Garrincha, Jairzinho, Pele, Tostao, Ademir, Leonidas; GK: Gilmar, E. Leao, Barbosa.

BRAZIL II: Jorginho, Cafu, D. Alves, Maicon, R. Carlos, Lucio, T. Silva, T. Cerezo, Dunga, Falcao, Socrates, Zico, Rivaldo, Kaka, Robinho, Ronaldinho, Neymar Jr., Bebeto, Romario, Ronaldo; GK: R. Ceni, C. Taffarel, J, Cesar.

ENGLAND I: J. Armfield, E. Hapgood, E. Hughes, N. Franklin, B. Moore, J. Charlton, R. Wilson, B. Wright, N. Stiles, D. Edwards, A. Ball, M. Peters, J. Haynes, B. Charlton, S, Matthews, T. Finney, K. Keegan, D. Dean, T. Lawton, J. Greaves; GK: R. Clemence, F. Swift, G. Banks.

ENGLAND II: A. Cole, T. Adams, S. Campbell, D. Beckham, J. Terry, R. Ferdinand, P. Neal, B. Robson, D. Platt, P. Scholes, S. Gerrard, F. Lampard, G. Hoddle, P. Gascoigne, P. Beardsley, W. Rooney, A. Shearer, G. Lineker, M. Owen; GK: P. Shilton, D. Seaman, J. Hart.

FRANCE: M. Amoros, L. Thuram, B. Lizarazu, M. Desailly, M. Tresor, L. Blanc, D. Deschamps, P. Vieira, J. Tigana, P. Pogba, R. Kopa, M. Platini, Z. Zidane, F. Robery, R. Piantoni, E. Cantona, J. Fontaine, J. P. Papin, T. Henry; GK: F. Barthez, J. Bats, J. Darui.

GERMANY I: B. Vogts, M. Kaltz, K. H. Schnellinger, P. Breitner, P. Janes, W. Schultz, F. Beckenbauer, H. Syzmaniak, R. Bonhof, G. Netzer, W. Overath, F. Walter, F. Szepan, A. Kupfer, H. Rahn, H. Schafer, M. Morlock, H. Haller, U. Seeler, G. Muller; GK: B. Trautmann, S. Maier, J. Croy.

GERMANY II: A. Brehme, P.Lahm, K. H. Forster, J. Kohler, M. Sammer, G. Buchwald, H. P. Briegel, S. Khedira, L. Matthaus, S. Effenberg, M. Ballack, B. Schweinsteiger, T. Kroos, T. Muller, R. Voller, M. Klose, J. Klinsmann, H. H. Rummenigge, O. Bierhoff, K. Allofs; GK: H. Schumacher, O. Kahn, M. Neuer.

ITALY I: T. Burgnich, G. Facchetti, P. Rava, A. Foni, C. Gentile, V. Rosetta, G. Scirea, G. Antognoni, G. Ferrari, V. Mazzola, G. Rivera, S. Mazzola, G. Bulgarelli, R. Benetti, G. Meazza, G. Boniperti, S. Piola, L. Riva, R. Bettega, A. Baloncieri; GK: G. Combi, D. Zoff, E. Albertosi.

ITALY II: A. Cabrini, P. Maldini, C. Ferrara, F. Cannavaro, G. Bergomi, A. Nesta, F. Beresi, M. Tardelli, D. Albertini, G. Gattuso, D. De Rossi, C. Ancelotti, A. Pirlo, R. Mancini, B. Conti, R. Baggio, A. Del Piero, F. Totti, C. Vieri, P. Rossi; GK: G. Buffon, W. Zenga, G. Pagliuca.

NETHERLANDS: W. Suurbier, R. Krol, F. DeBoer, J. Stam, R. Koeman, C. Van Der Hart, R. Israel, R. Gullit, F. Rijkaard, J. Neeskens, C. Seedorf, E. Davids, W. Van Hanegem, W. Sneijder, A. Robben, J. SPAIN: J. Camacho, J. Quincoces, M. A. Nadal, F. Hierro, G. Pique, C. Puyol, S. Ramos, S. Busquets, C. Fabregas, P. Guardiola, X. Alonso, Xavi, A. Iniesta, D. Silva, E. Basora, F. Gento, Raul, T. Zarra, D. Villa, F. Torres; GK: R. Zamora, I. Casillas, D. De Gea.

BRITISH ISLES: D. McGrain, A. Hansen, J. Carey, D. Irwin, P. McGrath, B. McNeill, D. Mackay, G. Souness, R. Keane, D. Blanchflower, S. McIlroy, B. Bremner, J. Baxter, D. Law, K. Dalglish, G. Best, J. Charles, R. Giggs, G. Bales; GK: H. Gregg, P. Jennings, N. Southall.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
